meanings.definition: A Japanese syllabary consisting of 46 basic characters.
meanings.sent1: In Japanese, we learn hiragana to read and write.
meanings.sent2: She practiced writing hiragana characters every day.
meanings.sent3: The hiragana characters danced across the page.
meanings.sent4: Her notebook was filled with the graceful curves of hiragana.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's hiragana lesson was clear and easy to follow.
